Entries.default: Rocky outcroppings pepper the face of the cliffside. You can make out the shape of stone ruins situated high above.
You stand at the top of Ori o KoÄ«ki's highest cliffs, peering down at the jungle below with due caution.
[Climb up.]
[Leave.]
[Climb down.]
[Study the cliff.]
You note that a crevasse, which would otherwise have proven a useful foothold on the journey up, is home to a bulbous and pulsating nest of wasps.
Your foot slips into a crevasse and hits something soft. A cloud of stinging wasps billows forth and overwhelms you, though you manage to keep your footing and grit through the pain.
You begin the climb, alternating your attention between your footing and any less obvious dangers.
You come upon a ledge that commands the cliffside. The outcropping looks like it could support an adult's weight, though it would take a nimble outdoorsman to plot a safe course.
[Send someone up to scout for a safe route.]
[Climb down to the bottom of the cliff.]
Breathless, [Specified 0] makes it to the top and gestures to indicate the safest route up.
After scaling the cliff with a mountain goat's alacrity, [Specified 0] waves down at you and signals the optimal path up.
[Specified 0] struggles up the cliffside, just barely managing to reach the top. Winded, [Specified 0] points out the safest path.
[Specified 0] struggles to scout a path up the cliff. After a spirited effort, [Specified 0] is forced to backtrack to the halfway point panting for breath.
[Have someone study the cliff.]

The terrain offers an abundance of hand and footholds, though the length of the climb alone would exact a heavy toll of effort and strain.

Scouting for a secure passage could help to mitigate the risks of a hard climb.
[Specified 0] squints up at the rock face, shrugging. The way up seems straightforward enough.
Though you have little doubt that the cliffside is pitted with unseen dangers, none are in evidence.
[Specified 0] squints up at the rock face and points at dangers which eluded you until now.

Higher still, a prominent ledge stands out as an intimidating obstacle. 

You note no other dangers of significance.
[Scout ahead for a safe route.]
You maneuver past the chancier rock formations and easily identify those able to support your weight.
While you are physically fit to make the climb, caution delays your progress and takes the wind out of you.
Though you possess the know-how to navigate the drop, the physical strain takes a heavy toll. You are barely able to clear the distance.
You maneuver past the chancier rock formations and easily identify those able to support your weight.
While you are physically fit to make the climb, caution delays your progress and takes the wind out of you.
Though you possess the know-how to navigate the drop, the physical strain takes a heavy toll. You are barely able to clear the distance.
The remainder of the climb is too significant an undertaking. Breathless, you backtrack to the halfway point.
The remainder of the climb is too significant an undertaking. Breathless, you backtrack to the halfway point.
You make for the summit of the cliff, panting from the exertion and grateful to find yourself once more on stable ground.
Taking a deep breath, you begin the slow and careful descent to the bottom of the cliff, mindful of any unstable footholds.
[Step away from the edge.]
You descend back to where you started. The stability of the ground is a welcome comfort.
You narrowly avoid the crevasse supporting the wasp nest and continue your ascent.
